vorspeise.Description: Gewuerztes Kartoffelpüree mit würzigem Kichererbsenteig ueberzogen und gebraten
Gebratene Linsenkugeln mit Ingwer und Curryblaettern

VEGETARIAN.Description: Rice and lentil crepes prepared in a skillet with ghee, accompanied with Sambar and Chutney
Rice and lentils crepe stuffed with mashed potato mixture, accompanied with Sambar and Chutney
The world famous dish from the Punjabi cuisine, this is a combination of Chana Masala and the fried bread called Bhatura

CHICKEN.Description: Duck is prepared with coconut milk and spices. Cooked potatoes and coconut milk give it a creamy texture.
Chicken fillets cooked in light creamy sauce and classic Indian curry spices
South Indian chicken specialty prepared with potatoes, coconut and spices.
